name: Fat Guy Fit Climb: Flabby Fitness Dash!
name_original: Fat Guy Fit Climb: Flabby Fitness Dash!
description:
A 1-touch weight loss adventure! Fat Guy Fit Climb is a fun and addictive relay style skill game. Just climb steps, lose weight and don't fall!

> Tap left to climb 1 step at a time
> Tap right to climb 2 steps at a time
> Avoid the holes
> Move fast for time extensions
> Lose weight and get fit!
> ..and most importantly- BEAT your friends

Have comments or suggestions? Feel free to drop us a line at support@i4customized.com.
